lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Last Friday Reagan, answering questions following a speech to the Los Angeles World Affairs Council, said Nakasone had endangered his political standing at home because of his willingess to try to eliminate trade barriers against U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S.-Jpanese relations as Japanese Prime Minister Yasuhiro Nakasone prepares to visit Washington at the end of the month for talks with Reagan.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He accused Japan of failing to enforce major provisions of a September 1986 agreement on preventing microchip dumping and providing American industry with fair trade opportunities.
